articles.description: Ajith Kumar and his family celebrated New Year in Dubai. A new video shows him dancing with a member of the hotel staff during the celebration.
articles.content: Ajith Kumar is enjoying his holiday in Dubai. His wife, Shalini Ajith, and two children accompanied him for the holiday. A new video of Ajith dancing with a hotel staff during New Year's celebrations… [+1220 chars]

articles.author: IE Online
articles.title: Dua Lipa parties with Jaipur’s Princess Gauravi Kumar on New Year - The Indian Express
articles.description: International superstar Dua Lipa spent New Year's Eve with her family at a plush property in Rajasthan's Jaipur, welcoming 2024.

articles.description: Bigg Boss introduces captaincy task; Munawar, Isha, and Aoora select new captain; Munawar and Mannara fight; Ankita and Vicky request captaincy opport
articles.content: Rinku Dhawan: Ankita and I got to know each other in Bigg Boss 17, she is my sister's best friend not mine
